评论详情: The item is very pretty, has a nice design and color. My only complaint is that the chain is thin, tangles easy and looked a bit cheap compared to the pendant. I will replace the chain.

评论概述: Misleading picture. Cheap material. fake stone.
评论详情: I was so excited for this necklace.  Was hoping to gift it. Expected it would be a bit cheap based off the price. Looks like something you'd get from a vending machine for a couple coins. No doubt the material would tarnish right away, but not before leaving a nice green stain around your neck. The "amethyst" is a very weird stone, likely plastic or resin. Most definitely not a real amethyst.  Shame the quality is so bad because the design is cute.

评论概述: Picture is misleading. It is TINY
评论详情: I was so excited for this necklace only to discover it's tiny compared to the picture and feels very light and cheap. And the crescent moons are links, they move around.

The pendant comes on a simple black rope, but the pendant itself is beautiful. The illustration inside is almost entrancing, really beautiful blue colors. It's spooky and peaceful at the same time, somehow.
This is a fun costume necklace. It's well-made with cheap materials. I wouldn't wear this daily but it will be a nice addition to costumes. I appreciate the detail to the back of the pendant.

When I bought this necklace, I already thought it was cool. When I physical got my hands on it, I was glad to see how good it looked in person! It is big enough to draw other's attention to you and your cool looking necklace. I how highly recommend it!
